json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="entityMappings">
<prop type="array" name="fieldMappings">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop type="array" name="tactics">
<prop type="array" name="techniques">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings" options="entity-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings[].fieldMappings" options="field-mappings">
<arg type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.labels" options="labels" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.tactics" options="tactics" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.techniques" options="techniques" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="entityMappings" arg="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings">
<prop type="array" name="fieldMappings" arg="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings[].fieldMappings">
<prop type="array" name="labels" arg="$bookmark.properties.labels">
<prop type="array" name="tactics" arg="$bookmark.properties.tactics">
<prop type="array" name="techniques" arg="$bookmark.properties.techniques">

<prop type="array" name="fieldMappings">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop type="array" name="tactics">
<prop type="array" name="techniques">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings" options="entity-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.entityMappings[].fieldMappings" options="field-mappings">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.labels" options="labels" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.tactics" options="tactics" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$bookmark.properties.techniques" options="techniques" group="Properties">
